entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
